operation.description: Subtract one dataset from another or subtract a scalar value.
operation.name: Subtract

operation.description: Add one dataset to another or add a scalar value.
operation.name: Add

operation.description: Create a mask with intensity values below a lower bound and above an upper bound masked.
operation.name: Threshold Mask

operation.description: Import a Mask from .nxs or fit2d mask file. A mask file can be created using the masking tool.
operation.name: Import Mask From File

operation.description: Increase the size of masked regions by dilating the mask by a set number of pixels
operation.name: Dilate Mask

operation.description: Azimithal profile of an image using a sector region.
operation.name: Sector Azimuthal Profile

operation.description: Using a box region, select a portion of the data to integrate in X or Y.
operation.name: Box Integration

operation.description: Use a rectangular region to crop and rotate a selected data region
operation.name: Cut Rotated Cartesian Box

operation.description: Run an arbitrary function on the data to transform it.
operation.name: Function Operation

operation.description: Fit a peak to 1D data
operation.name: Peak Fit

operation.description: Apply Savitzky-Golay filtering
operation.name: Savitzky-Golay filtering

operation.description: Import the experimental detector geometry and x-ray energy (can be determined in powder calibration perspective). Required for operations which transform data to 2 theta/q/d-space.
operation.name: Import Detector Calibration

operation.description: Azimuthal integration of a 2D powder diffraction/SAXS image to a 1D pattern (Intensity vs q, 2 theta, d or pixel). Requires Detector Calibration information to be in the pipeline (use Import Detector Calibration).
operation.name: Azimuthal Integration

operation.description: Radial integration of a 2D powder diffraction/SAXS image to intenisty vs azimuthal angle. Requires Detector Calibration information to be in the pipeline (use Import Detector Calibration).
operation.name: Radial Integration

operation.description: Solid angle, polarisation and detector transmission corrections. Requires Detector Calibration information to be in the pipeline (use Import Detector Calibration).
operation.name: Powder Diffraction Intensity Corrections

operation.description: Remap a powder diffraction/SAXS image to q/2theta vs azimuthal angle. Requires Detector Calibration information to be in the pipeline (use Import Detector Calibration).
operation.name: Cake Remapping

operation.description: Rolling ball baseline correction with fixed radius
operation.name: Rolling Ball Baseline Correction

operation.description: Gaussian filter an image using kernal of specified width
operation.name: Gaussian Filter

operation.description: Minimum filter an image using a kernel of a specified width
operation.name: Minimum Filter

operation.description: Maximum filter an image with a kernel of a specific width
operation.name: Max Filter

operation.description: Median filter an image with a kernel of a specified width
operation.name: Median Filter

operation.description: Mean filter an image with a kernel of a specified width
operation.name: Mean Filter

operation.description: Save XY data as text
operation.name: Export to Text File

operation.description: Downsample an image using the corner, mean, min, or max value. The type the output data should take (int, float etc) can also be specified
operation.name: Downsample Image

operation.description: Trapezoidal integration of the data between the specified range, with the option to subtract a local linear baseline.
operation.name: Integrate Range

operation.description: Custom mathematical operation, use "data" for the data variable and "xaxis" for the axis, use the dnp: and dat: namespaces to access different mathematical functions
operation.name: Mathematical Expression [1D]

operation.description: Custom mathematical operation on an image, use "data" for the data variable and "xaxis" and "yaxis" for the axes, use the dnp: and dat: namespaces to access different mathematical functions
operation.name: Mathematical Expression [2D]

operation.description: Custom mathematical operation including q, tth, azimuth and energy, use the dnp: and dat: namespaces to access different mathematical functions
operation.name: Mathematical Expression [2D Diffraction]

operation.description: Subtract a background image from a different file
operation.name: Subtract Background Image

operation.description: Subtract a blank frame in the processed dataset
operation.name: Subtract Blank Frame

operation.description: A filter which normalises the data frame by the profile of the selected region of the X axis.
operation.name: X Region Profile Normalize

operation.description: Subtract mean and divide by standard deviation to bring all XY data onto the same scale
operation.name: Standard Normal Variate

operation.description: Sets the current value of the data as the variance on the dataset
operation.name: Set Poisson Error

operation.description: Crop XY data to a specified range
operation.name: Crop Data [1D]

operation.description: Average all the data into a single dataset
operation.name: Average All Data

operation.description: Crop an image to a specified size
operation.name: Crop Data [2D]

operation.description: Mask pixels outside the specified region
operation.name: Mask Outside Region

operation.description: Normalise data against the value from a corresponding value in an external dataset (if path is empty, dataset from processed file is used)
operation.name: Normalisation

operation.description: Subtract a dataset (or average if stack) in the specified file
operation.name: Subtract Data

operation.description: Fit an ellipse to the ring at the specified q value - parameters returned as auxiliary data
operation.name: Diffraction Ellipse Fit

operation.description: Rotates an image by a certain angle around the image centre
operation.name: Image Rotation

operation.description: Performs an affine transformation on the image
operation.name: Affine Transformation

operation.description: Convert XY diffraction data axes between q, 2 theta and d-space
operation.name: Convert Diffraction Axis Type [1D]

operation.description: Rebin data onto new axis with specified start, stop and number of points (defaults to min, max and number of points in first axis
operation.name: Rebin XY Data

operation.description: Subtract a polynomial baseline using an iterative fitting routine. On each iteration any data above the fit is set to the fit value.
operation.name: Iterative Polynomial Baseline Subtraction

operation.description: Subtract a selected dataset of the input data (or average) from all datasets
operation.name: Subtract Input Data

operation.description: Averages the data along the fastest non-data dimension of the array. For example, if the data set shape is [a,b,c,X,Y] where X and Y are the data dimensions, c is the fastest axis (row-major order)
operation.name: Average Fastest Dimension Only

operation.description: Applies a threshold across the whole image
operation.name: Image Threshold

operation.description: Extracts blobs on binary image
operation.name: Blob Extraction

operation.description: Stitches two images together given X and Y translations
operation.name: Image Stitching

operation.description: Concatenate two datasets together, taking into account axes scaling
operation.name: Dataset Concatenation

operation.description: Add errors to data
operation.name: General Detector Error

operation.description: Stops data being sent down the pipeline, used to not duplicate your data if you only need the auxiliary output
operation.name: No Data

operation.description: Propagates the input data without modifying it, used to convert other data formats to nexus
operation.name: No Change

operation.description: Save image as text with x axis as first column, use with caution, files can get very large
operation.name: Export to Text File [Image]

operation.description: Averages sections of the data along the fastest non-data dimension of the array. For example, if the data set shape is [a,b,c,X,Y] where X and Y are the data dimensions, c is the fastest axis (row-major order)
operation.name: Average Sections of Fastest Dimension

operation.description: Determine the X and Y centroid values (saved to file)
operation.name: Centroid

operation.description: Normalize the minimum to zero and the maximum to one
operation.name: Minimum Maximum Normalization

operation.description: Creates a Gaussian-blurred image using the given kernel and then subtract the blurred image/pseudo flat field from the original image
operation.name: Pseudo-Flat Field Filter

operation.description: Subtract a spline from the data
operation.name: Spline Baseline Subtraction

operation.description: Integrate an image along a selected axis
operation.name: Image Integration

operation.description: Divide data by a value taken from the file metadata
operation.name: Normalisation [metadata]

operation.description: Doesn't do anything but make the thread sleep. For testing purposes.
operation.name: Sleep

operation.description: Multiply dataset by external value
operation.name: Multiply

operation.description: Subtract external data from a dataset
operation.name: Subtract

operation.description: Divide dataset by external value
operation.name: Divide

operation.description: Add external data to a Dataset
operation.name: Add

operation.description: Difference between the mean of two boxes
operation.name: Two Box Mean Difference

operation.description: Ratio of the mean of two boxes
operation.name: Two Box Mean Ratio

operation.description: Mask values inside, or outside a set co-ordinate range
operation.name: Mask by coordinate

operation.description: Read calibration and mask from the NeXus file being processed
operation.name: Read Nexus Detector Information

operation.description: Fit a function to the data, using a function generated in the function fitting tool and exported as a NeXus file
operation.name: Fit Imported Function

operation.description: Multipy by a scalar
operation.name: Multiply by Scalar

operation.description: Subtract a scalar
operation.name: Subtract Scalar

operation.description: Divide by a scalar
operation.name: Divide by Scalar

operation.description: Add a scalar
operation.name: Add Scalar

operation.description: Returns mean values within a Box
operation.name: Box Mean

operation.description: Subtract the average of two regions in X from the signal region
operation.name: Subtract Average X Regions Integration

operation.description: Multiply dataset by internal value
operation.name: Multiply

operation.description: Subtract internal data from a dataset
operation.name: Subtract

operation.description: Divide dataset by internal value
operation.name: Divide

operation.description: Add internal data to a Dataset
operation.name: Add

operation.description: Multiply dataset by frame (or average of stack) from external file
operation.name: Multiply Frame

operation.description: Subtract frame (or average of stack) from external file
operation.name: Subtract Frame

operation.description: Multiply dataset by frame (or average of stack) from external file
operation.name: Divide Frame

operation.description: Add frame (or average of stack) from external file
operation.name: Add Frame
Transpose Data
operation.description: Transpose a 2D dataset, including its axes
Filter data by removing rows and/or columns that do no meet a condition
operation.name: Filter data

operation.description: Saves the sum of the data (and the sum of the square root) pass the input data down the pipeline
operation.name: Sum

operation.description: Perform a Herman Orientation calculation on a region of an image
operation.name: Herman Orientation

operation.description: Perform a 2D Fourier transform on an image
operation.name: Image Fourier Transform
